about_the_game:
Illusions Book

This Illusions Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image is a different optical illusion to play with your eyes and mind!
Get ready to take a second look to figure out what you're seeing!

Contents

The Illusions book unlocks the following images:


  • Columns - 95x130
  • In or Out - 98x98
  • Wavy - 100x100
  • Colored Balls - 116x85
  • Youth or Age - 117x131
  • Parallel Lines - 120x85
  • Rubin's Vase - 129x177
  • Elephant's Legs - 130x88
  • Checker Shadow - 135x110
  • Rabbit or Duck - 140x75
  • Penrose Triangle - 142x133
  • Non-Spiral - 160x160
  • Straight Grid - 170x170
  • Straight Lines - 190x106
  • Impossible Ring - 194x106
  • Rotation - 199x199
  • Perspective - 200x129
  • Not Red - 230x215
  • Snakes - 250x119
  • Negative Space - 441x162

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
